local_intent: Grasp the green bin lid using precomputed 'lid_grasp', with fine alignment, retry on grasp, then verify stable hold.
assumptions: TCP yaw set to 90 degrees upstream
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT grasp phase: uses precomputed lid_grasp, maintains 0.01 alignment tolerance, retries grasp, and verifies by stability and object-in-gripper checks.
